about_the_game:
Play first 2 stages for free!

[Play Time]
Around 30 minutes

[Ending]
There are 2 ways to defeat the 2nd boss and several events will be changed.

[Secret Events]
There will be at 2nd stage.
At the "Hint Menu", you will see a unfamiliar page.

[Attention]
*Demo save files cannot be transferred to main game.
*Some contents might be different from the product version.

[Main Game Release Date]
Around Summer of 2023
